Title: October 2021
Content: *p67155a02028*20	  16	 after an atom of hydrogen has been exposed to suitable electromagnetic radiation, the atom can emit visible light. the emitted light contains a small number of different wavelengths of visible light. 	 *(a)	 explain the process that results in the emission of different wavelengths of visible light. your answer should include reference to energy levels in atoms. (6)
